coreAttributes.name: Arcane Revolver
coreAttributes.description: The Arcane Revolver, unlike the earlier Muskets, is able to shoot multiple times in quick succession by drawing on only a negligible amount of the wielder's essence. The cost of such an advantage is decreased combat effectiveness and a higher price tag as manufacturing these weapons is neither cheap nor simple.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.name] [npc.verb(shoot)] at [npc2.name] and hit them in the chest. The arcane energy is distributed around their body, staggering them but not inflicting any permanent damage.
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(shoot)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] revolver, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to graze [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the arcane projectile.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.name] [npc.verb(shoot)] at [npc2.name] but the arcane projectile flies off course.
[npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to shoot at [npc2.name] but the gun jams!
